text: Allvar Gullstrand (5 June 1862 â€“ 28 July 1930) was a Swedish ophthalmologist (eye doctor). He won the 1911 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, for his work on light refraction and the eye. ==References== Category:1862 births Category:1930 deaths Category:Swedish biologists Category:Swedish Nobel Prize winners
title: Allvar Gullstrand
